ComicInfo.Series: The Stand: The Night Has Come
ComicInfo.Summary: The penultimate issue of the epic series! The last stand has happened, True Believers, but what of Stu Redman? Alone, leg broken, lost in the desert, sickness spreading through his body, can he possibly survive the wilderness and make it back to Boulder and his beloved Frannie? For Stu, the end truly is only the beginning, and the hardest part of his journey lies ahead. And don't forget, there is one other wanderer in the desert, who could mean the difference between life and death, if only they were to find each other...

ComicInfo.Characters: Tom Cullen,Nick Andros' ghost,Stuart Redman,Kojak,George Richardson (dream)
